items.sentence: I called you in here to ask you a question.
I can see mountains from my bedroom window.
When was the last time Tom gave you a gift?
When was the last time you gave Tom a gift?
When was the last time you had a boyfriend?
Tom opened the door and entered the office.
Tom persuaded Mary to sing a duet with him.
Tom picked up a broom and started sweeping.
I\'m quite sure Tom won\'t want to do that.
Are you sure Tom won\'t be here until 2:30?
Tom told me that he\'d forgotten something.
Tom told me why he didn\'t want to do that.
The bus that Tom is on should be here soon.
The car he was riding crashed into a train.
I don\'t think that there\'s a doctor here.
My brother is holding a camera in his hand.
My older sister often drinks tea with milk.
I don\'t understand what Tom is doing here.
I don\'t want to waste time talking to Tom.
I enjoy singing, but I don\'t like dancing.
We haven\'t heard from Tom since last year.
Tom and Mary should both have stayed awake.

I honestly didn\'t think Tom would show up.
I suspect that Tom and Mary aren\'t hungry.
I think it\'s time for me to get a new job.
I need to make sure your leg isn\'t broken.

Why weren\'t you paying attention in class?
I want to spend some time with my daughter.
I want to thank you again for believing me.
I was able to swim well when I was a child.
Don\'t say anything unless it\'s important.
Don\'t talk about work. We\'re on vacation.
Don\'t worry. We\'ll figure everything out.
Tom may not have done what we think he did.
Tom may not want to do that, but he should.

What are some of Australia\'s main exports?

My mother and father have a big farm there.
My mother is making a birthday cake for me.
The keys are on the dresser next to my hat.

The last time I saw Tom was three days ago.
I\'ve done everything I was supposed to do.

I\'ve just finished watching episode three.
I assumed it was Tom who wrote this report.
I blame Tom for what happened to all of us.

I wish I could prevent that from happening.
I wish I could speak French as well as Tom.
I wish I could tell you something positive.

A glass of water will make you feel better.
A lot of people feel the same way Tom does.
A new bridge is being built over the river.
A tall building was built next to my house.
I know a place we can get something to eat.
I\'m sorry, but I already have other plans.
I\'m spending Christmas Eve with my family.
I\'m taking Tom to his favorite restaurant.

I\'m going to buy a camera for my daughter.
I just want to thank you for all your help.

This sort of work calls for great patience.
This suitcase is too heavy for me to carry.
